about_the_game: Experience a refreshing new beginning with Jon Rob's original soundtrack for Maguntsche: Chapter One Remastered! All of the tracks in this album were specially made to further enhance the user's experience. In this soundtrack, you will find plenty of chilling ambiance tracks and horrifying tunes that have brought The Maguntsche Demon new life. If you would like to support the developer and composer, you can do so by purchasing this soundtrack; currently only available on the Steam platform!

short_description: Experience the original soundtrack for the remastered edition of Maguntsche: Chapter One! This complete soundtrack includes music and ambiance you'll find in-game, as well as other unreleased tracks.
